sn35.7:3.1: 7. Ajjhattāniccātītānāgatasutta
sn35.7:4.3: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītasmiṃ cakkhusmiṃ anapekkho hoti;
sn35.7:4.5: paccuppannassa cakkhussa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn35.7:4.10: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītāya jivhāya anapekkho hoti;
sn35.7:4.12: paccuppannāya jivhāya nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn35.7:4.16: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītasmiṃ manasmiṃ anapekkho hoti;
sn35.7:4.18: paccuppannassa manassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hotī”ti.
